decisions.title: Adopt Next.js 15 (App Router) with TypeScript and Tailwind
decisions.context: Need SEO-first, SSG/ISR-aware framework with excellent DX to hit <2s global loads and quality gates.
decisions.decision: Use Next.js 15 with App Router, TypeScript strict mode, Tailwind for styling.
consequences: Fast global performance with SSG/ISR on Vercel CDN
Strict typing improves maintainability and quality
decisions.rationale: Best alignment with SEO, performance, tooling, and Vercel platform.

decisions.title: Use Ghost Pro as headless CMS and native newsletter (ConvertKit fallback)
decisions.context: Need reliable CMS + newsletter with low ops burden and future paid memberships.
decisions.decision: Primary: Ghost Pro (content + newsletter). Fallback: ConvertKit via abstraction layer.
decisions.rationale: Ghost covers most needs, supports growth and monetization.

decisions.title: Host on Vercel with Edge CDN
decisions.context: Global audience, need sub-2s loads and serverless scalability.
decisions.decision: Deploy on Vercel; leverage ISR and global edge network.
decisions.rationale: Best fit for Next.js, speed, and DX.

decisions.title: Caching and Revalidation Strategy
decisions.decision: Static assets: 1y immutable; ISR pages: s-maxage=300, stale-while-revalidate=86400; API: s-maxage=60, stale-while-revalidate=300.
decisions.rationale: Meets performance targets while enabling updates.

decisions.title: Analytics: GA4 + Plausible dual integration
decisions.decision: Implement GA4 with consent management; add Plausible for privacy-focused metrics.

decisions.title: Security & GDPR baseline
decisions.context: Subscriber data handling and compliance requirements.
decisions.decision: Security headers, TLS1.3, RBAC, data minimization, double opt-in, export/delete endpoints, audit logs.
decisions.rationale: Meets security gates and legal obligations.

decisions.title: Abstraction layers for external services
decisions.context: Future flexibility (newsletter provider changes, social APIs).
decisions.decision: Introduce lib/newsletter and lib/ghost abstraction interfaces.

risks.mitigation: Guest author network, editorial buffers, repurposing.
